promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary dragonfly grass-type pokemon with a white and green crystal core. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or dragonfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Emeraldion, a a gigantic legendary dragonfly grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Max Tree, Take Away. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragonfly", "grass" or "Emeraldion". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, dragonfly-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: A rare titan of the jungle, Emeraldion crafts colossal arboreal fortresses while draining foes' energy with its Take Away ability.
